snippet.title: Longplay of Death Crimson OX/Guncom 2
snippet.description:
Longplay of Death Crimson OX, played with the NTSC version on the Dreamcast. This game's version was released on Aug. 5th, 2001. Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

00:00 - Start
00:29 - Stage 1: Azalea Street
02:34 - Boss: Sword the Stink
03:46 - Stage 2: Zahhou
08:08 - Boss: Metal Gloves
09:27 - Stage 3: Polvenir
13:30 - Boss: Karin
15:07 - Stage 4: Desert
17:03 - Boss: Barmia
18:22 - Stage 5: Factory
19:49 - Boss: Tracery
22:04 - Boss: Echizen
23:15 - Stage 6: Saffer
24:05 - Final Boss: SMO Zaza
28:05 - Ending
29:07 - Credits

By: Spazbo4
